summary: BuildRequest defines no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies the backend to add user profile storage and phone/OTP verification logic, plus updates project_state.json content; these changes are not requested by the BuildRequest summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile APIs and persistent userProfiles map (name/email/phone/phoneVerified), including authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest lists no requirements and specifically states the customer login page is already implemented; no backend profile/authorization work was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend phone verification/OTP attempt tracking (requestPhoneVerification, verificationAttempts, hardcoded code "1234", maxAttempts, expiry logic implied by types).
hallucinated_features.reason: No OTP/phone verification backend changes were requested; also non-goals mention no real SMS delivery, but even a stub OTP service was not asked for in this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update describing broader storefront features and REQ-1/REQ-2/etc references.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements and does not ask to modify project tracking/state files.
